column1: Uchi////Not even going to waste time writing much of a review. It's one of the best and most enjoyable meals in Houston. Food is out of this world. Happy hour is fantastic
column2: but come for dinner anyway so you get off the happy hour menu. I typically like a traditional cocktail or whiskey on the rocks
column3: but even their cocktails are good enough to make me change it up. A cucumber cocktail!? Who could have imagined. There are over 900 reviews and almost all are 5 stars. Just go. There are no questions you need answered.
